resume.name: ASHANTI LATTIMORE

experience.title: Junior Actuarial Analyst
responsibilities: Perform quarterly loss development and trend analysis for personal lines of business to ensure reserve adequacy.
Maintain and enhance automated reporting dashboards using R and SQL to track key performance indicators.
Assist in the preparation of actuarial memorandums for state regulatory rate filings.
Collaborate with product management to evaluate the impact of proposed pricing changes on loss ratios.

experience.title: Actuarial Intern
responsibilities: Constructed frequency and severity models to evaluate catastrophic risk exposure using Python.
Cleaned and validated large-scale datasets for use in stochastic modeling and pricing exercises.
Prepared detailed exhibits for annual statements and assisted in the reconciliation of financial data.
Participated in peer review of pricing models for property and casualty treaty reinsurance contracts.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
